articles.title: The Afghan War Ended With Zero M.I.A.s - The New York Times
articles.description: After two decades of combat, there were no American troops missing in action, reflecting a major shift in military priorities.
articles.content:
Instead of conscripts, soldiers became a profession, with professional standards, Mr. Wong said. Leaving no one behind came to be seen as what professionals do.

articles.title: Anglo appoints Nompumelelo Zikalala as Kumba Iron Ore's first female CEO - News24
articles.description: Kumba Iron Ore, a subsidiary of Anglo American, announced on Tuesday that it has appointed De Beers' Nompumelelo 'Mpumi' Zikalala as its new CEO.
articles.content:
Kumba Iron Ore, a subsidiary of Anglo American, announced on Tuesday that it has appointed Nompumelelo 'Mpumi' Zikalala as its new CEO.
